help.text:
• 'ma: remind DD.MM.YYYY hh:mm' to add a meeting
  • 'ma: list' to list all meetings
  • 'ma: delete (Meeting Nr.)' to delete a meeting. You can see the number by listing the meetings
  • 'ma: statistics' to see statistics of the conversation

meetingReminder.text:
• 'ma: remind DD.MM.YYYY hh:mm' to add a meeting
  • 'ma: remind list' to list all meetings
  • 'ma: delete meeting(Meeting Nr.)' to delete a meeting. You can see the number by listing the meetings

textStatistics.text:
By adding the assistant to the conversation, statistics are already made.
Goto http://localhost:5000/statistics to see them.

add.text1: A new meeting was added. You will be reminded on
add.text2:
GMT.
You can cancel by writing 'ma: delete meeting

list.noMeetingsText: No meetings are saved for reminding.

repetition.text1: Do you want to assign a new meeting
repetition.text2: ? Please answer: 'ma: yes' or 'ma: no'. If you want to get a .ics file, just add 'ics' at the end.

texts: I won't say good bye to youu!.. so I'll just say good night to you.
Today I am the SUPER assistant!
Today you can call me MC Hammer
Life couldn't get better, it's the best day ever

textStatistics.text: Here are your statistics! More on http://localhost:5000/statistics

tooMuchServices.text: You want to you use more than one service parallel, that's not possible! Please try it again or ask for help with 'ma: help'

parsingErrors.writtenOptionsWrong: Your input format was wrong. Please ask for help with 'ma: help'

errors.writtenOptionsWrong: Your command is not correct. Please try again or ask for help by typing 'ma: help'
